name: Cake Coloring 3D
description:
Paint beautiful cakes in 3D by coloring individual parts. Like a coloring book game, you paint by number. Choose a color from the palette then color by number each element until the cake is fully colorized.

Our cakes are fully 3D. Swipe to rotate, and tap to paint as you find all the pieces of this coloring puzzle. Use hints to quickly find hidden objects.

Our cakes look realistic, appealing to adults and cake enthusiasts. Get inspired by our amazing cake designs.

Painting is calming and relaxing. Paint with dark mode enabled to relax in bed before going sleep. Relax and enjoy our beautiful cakes!
